Type:

4-1/2 Inch cordless angle grinder 20V max

  • Powered by 20V MAX Lithium-ion battery (Battery and Charger sold separately)
  • Aluminum die cast gear housing
  • Spindle lock
  • Multiple position handle with convenient grinding wheel spanner storage incorporated 8,000 RPM no load speed M14 threaded spindle shaft

entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type:
Price: 85.51

[shortdesc]

20V max lithium-ion cordless variable speed reciprocating saw

  • Powered by 20V MAX Lithium-ion battery (Battery and Charger sold separately)
  • Tool-less blade clamp system for quick and easy blade changing
  • Variable speed trigger 0-3,000 strokes/min 1” stroke
  • Adjustable pivot shoe
  • Safety push button prevents accidental starts
  • Accepts standard 1/2” shank blades
  • Comes with one wood cutting blade and one metal cutting blade

entry.title: King Canada 8045L - Hammer Drill, Cordless, 20V Max Li-ion 8045L
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type:
Price: 85.51

[shortdesc]

20V max lithium-ion cordless hammer drill kit

  • Powered by 20V MAX Lithium-ion battery (Battery and Charger sold separately)
  • SDS+ chuck for use with SDS+ drill bits and SDS+ 3/8 Inch keyless chuck for use with standard drill bits
  • Drilling and percussion modes
  • Variable speed trigger with high/low speed selector
  • Forward/reverse switch with locking feature
  • Battery level indicator which also indicates the direction of rotation during use
  • Comes with SDS+ 3/8 Inch keyless chuck, 4 SDS+ drill bits (5/32 Inch, 1/4 Inch, 5/16 Inch and 3/8 Inch) and depth stop rod
    • [/shortdesc]

6-1/2 Inch cordless circular saw (20V max lithium-ion battery)

  • All ball bearing construction

  • Durable aluminum shoe with depth adjustment and adjustable bevel stops for angled cuts at 0° and 45°

12V Cordless drill / impact driver kit

  • 1 hour quick Li-ion battery charger 12V, 1,300m-Ah
  • Li-ion battery provides longer run time
  • Heavy-duty high torque gear box
  • Variable speed trigger with forward/reverse switch
  • Universal 1/4” female hex
  • drive quick release chuck (8012L only) Powerful 710 in/lbs of driving force (8012L only) Built-in high output LED light illuminates work surface for increased visibility Kit comes with 1 hour charger, 1 Li-ion battery and sturdy carrying case
  • Drill kit comes with 6 drill bits, 6 screwdriver bits and bit extension
  • Impact kit comes with 4 nut drivers with 1/4” hex

entry.title: Walter ZipCutter 34A150 - Zipcutter 4-1/2 / 5 Inch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Walter
Type: Grinders
Price: 391.11

[shortdesc]

ZIPCUTTER 4.5 Inch / 5 Inch

  • The ZIPCUTTER cordless angle cutter delivers the highest performance where a power supply is not available and is the only tool on the market able to power a 6" cutting wheel
  • It is paired with a 18V/ 5.2 Ah battery pack, the only one on the market with a Ventilated Charging System, allowing you to charge faster without damaging the battery
  • Similar to other state-of-the-art Walter grinders, this cordless cutter leverages the DYNAMAX electronic RPM control which protects the unit from overloading and overheating, 270° rotating battery pack and easy access to the internal carbon brushes
  • This cordless cutter features an electronic single cell protection, which prevents the cutter from short-circuiting and ruining the battery
  • Its special design prevents misalignment and vibration, allowing for more precise cutting with further stability
  • This cutter is available in two versions, 4-1/2", 5" and a 6" version.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Walter
    Line ZipCutter
    Product Type Grinders

    Extra Product Information

  • The most powerful cordless cutter on the market

    • Product Information

  • Ventilated Charging System 270° rotating rear housing
  • Lightweight DYNAMAX electronics
  • LED overload protection indicator
  • Electronic clutch
  • Detachable dust filter
  • Anti-vibration handle
  • Electronic single cell protection on battery
  • LED charge indicator on battery
  • Bevelled gears
  • Front retaining plate
  • Rear bushing
  • Spindle lock button
  • Power switch
    		•
